title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Optimizing Blended Learning Strategies for Business Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design educational materials in blended learning environments by applying cognitive load theory.
Learners can conduct case analysis discussions at least three times using real-time collaboration tools (e.g., Zoom breakout rooms).
Learners can complete asynchronous learning modules uploaded to the LMS system at least 80% and write reflective journals.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
